creator: Korita Applications
descriptionHtml:
Breaking news provides you access to news from United Kingdom's most popular news providers.

With Breaking news, you’ll see:

All the news you will need – Including Top Stories and live feed of news. You can browse news based on categories.

Full coverage – Understand the full context of any story with just a tap. Breaking news gives you everything online about a story.

Credible sources – Find quality content from a diverse set of credible publishers and discover sources you haven’t heard of before.

descriptionShort: Get the latest breaking news alerts, latest headlines, and daily articles.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fixed tiny bugs and added more news sources.

title: UK news - Breaking news

creator: Korita Applications
descriptionHtml:
Get the latest Breaking News and latest headlines from most credible news sources in the UK.

Download the app now!

With the Breaking News app you can access most credible and trusted sources.
Basically you can enjoy reading bbc news, the guardian, daily mail, sky news, the telegraph, the independent, metro newspaper, evening standard, daily star and many more Top UK news sources all in one app.
We are an alternative to google news and similar apps.

You can edit your news feed so you can follow news from your preferred sources on your favorite topics.

Breaking news app provides access to the latest news headlines from various sources so you can have a well rounded update on what is happening now.

Browse through thousands of articles that keep updated constantly.

Breaking news app provides you an option to change the country so you can browse news related to the country of your interest.


Sections

Available Sections in Breaking news app are:


- Home screen : Follow the latest news feed from most popular news sources. You can customise it so it meets your preferences.


- The Papers : The daily newspaper front pages so you can have a brief view of the daily press .

- All News : You can access the latest news and browse through the news history on the source you and category you select.

     Some of the categories you can browse are:

      - General News: The latest UK news and World news.

      - Entertainment News: The top news in showbiz.

      - Sports News: Breaking Sports News and Results including Football, Golf, Fighting Tennis .

      - Technology News : The most important technology news, developments and trends.

      - Science News: The most important science news.


- Weather News : Find the most current and reliable weather forecasts

- News Videos: Browse through most popular news videos on youtube.

- Search News : You have the option to search news from the news sources we support.

Your favourite source is not supported and you would prefer we add it? please contact us.

At this point we would like to thank you for your support, it is very important for us!
Thank you!

descriptionHtml:
Get the latest Breaking News and latest headlines from most credible news sources in the UK.

Download the app now!

With the Breaking News app you can access most credible and trusted sources.
Basically you can enjoy reading bbc news, the guardian, daily mail, sky news, the telegraph, the independent, metro newspaper, evening standard, daily star and many more Top UK news sources all in one app.
We are an alternative to google news and similar apps.

You can edit your news feed so you can follow news from your preferred sources on your favorite topics.

Breaking news app provides access to the latest news headlines from various sources so you can have a well rounded update on what is happening now.

Browse through thousands of articles that keep updated constantly.

Breaking news app provides you an option to change the country so you can browse news related to the country of your interest.


Sections

Available Sections in Breaking news app are:


- Home screen : Follow the latest news feed from most popular news sources. You can customise it so it meets your preferences.


- The Papers : The daily newspaper front pages so you can have a brief view of the daily press .

- All News : You can access the latest news and browse through the news history on the source you and category you select.

     Some of the categories you can browse are:

      - General News: The latest UK news and World news.

      - Entertainment News: The top news in showbiz.

      - Sports News: Breaking Sports News and Results including Football, Golf, Fighting Tennis .

      - Technology News : The most important technology news, developments and trends.

      - Science News: The most important science news.


- Weather News : Find the most current and reliable weather forecasts

- News Videos: Browse through most popular news videos on youtube.

- Search News : You have the option to search news from the news sources we support.

Your favourite source is not supported and you would prefer we add it? please contact us.

At this point we would like to thank you for your support, it is very important for us!
Thank you!
